definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the practice of medicine .
examples: Do you have any medical experience?

definitions.definition: Intended to have a therapeutic effect; medicinal .

examples: A costly medical condition can bankrupt you if it doesn't kill you first.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to the state of one's health.
Pertaining to or requiring treatment by other than surgical means.
Pertaining to medication specifically (that is, pharmacotherapy ), rather than to other aspects of medicine and surgery.
examples: medical oncology, radiation oncology, and surgical oncology
surgical therapy only when medical therapy fails

main_definition: Of or pertaining to the practice of medicine .
secondary_definitions: Intended to have a therapeutic effect; medicinal .
Pertaining to the state of one's health.
Pertaining to or requiring treatment by other than surgical means.
Pertaining to medication specifically (that is, pharmacotherapy ), rather than to other aspects of medicine and surgery.
